properties.areaDesc: Treutlen, GA; Montgomery, GA; Wheeler, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 7:31PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Montgomery...Treutlen and
Wheeler Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Oconee River near Mount Vernon.
* From Tuesday afternoon until further notice.
* At 7 PM Monday the stage was 14.6 feet...and rising.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 20.3 feet by Thursday early afternoon.
* At 20 feet...Moderate flooding begins. Significant flooding
occurs in the woodlands and pastures upstream and downstream from
the gage on U.S. Highway 280. The access road to the boat ramp on
the Wheeler County side of the river begins to flood. Around a
dozen homes on Dead River Road in the south end of Montgomery
County become surrounded with water. A few homes will have some
flooding. Portions of Dead River Road will be covered by at least
two feet of water.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
